# PREFLIGHT CHECKLIST
## 1. Power supply
## 1.1. Battery units
- Check that the substation unit is anchored to the floor. - Check that the APC units' Main Breaker is toggled on. - Check the APC units' current Load (W).
## 1.2. P.A.C.M.A.N. generator unit
- Check that P.A.C.M.A.N. generator unit is anchored to the floor. - Check that P.A.C.M.A.N. generator unit is fueled. For extended flights make sure that you have enough fuel stockpiled to sustain prolonged power generation. - Check that P.A.C.M.A.N. generator unit is set to HV output. - Set Target Power to 16 [bold]kW[/bold] on the generator unit. - Start P.A.C.M.A.N. generator unit.
## 2. Atmospherics
## 2.1. Distribution Loop
- Check that the air canister is anchored to connector port. - Check that the distribution pump is set to 101kPa. - Enable the distribution pump.
## 3. Other checks
- Check that the gyroscope is anchored, powered, and enabled. - Check that the mini gravity generator is anchored, powered, and enabled.
